snippet: An anti-abortion group fell short on Tuesday in its attempt to gather signatures to change the Ohio Constitution to declare that life begins when an egg is fertilized.
abstract: Anti-abortion group falls short in its attempt to gather signatures to change the Ohio Constitution to declare that life begins when an egg is fertilized.
lead_paragraph: An anti-abortion group fell short on Tuesday in its attempt to gather signatures to change the Ohio Constitution to declare that life begins when an egg is fertilized.

headline.main: Ohio: Abortion Foes Fail in Signature Collection
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Abortion Foes Fail In Signature Collection
